messages.subject: Kyushu Tachibana/Yanagawa clan
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All Can anyone point me in the direction of some good reference books/pages on the Kyushu Yanagawa Clan, particularly in connection with the swordsmith Muto
messages.messageBody:
Hi All

Can anyone point me in the direction of some good reference books/pages on
the Kyushu Yanagawa Clan, particularly in connection with the swordsmith
Muto Shinano no Kami Fujiwara Hisahiro.

Many thanks in advance.

Paul
